property.name: metron_rest_port
property.description: Port the REST application runs on

property.name: metron_jvm_flags
property.description: JVM flags passed to Metron scripts

property.name: metron_spring_profiles_active
property.description: Active Spring profiles. 'ldap' is used to enable authentication via LDAP.

property.name: metron_jdbc_driver
property.description: Class name of the JDBC Driver used by Metron

property.name: metron_jdbc_url
property.description: JDBC Connection URL used by Metron

property.name: metron_jdbc_username
property.description: Metron JDBC Username

property.name: metron_jdbc_password
property.description: Metron JDBC Password

property.name: metron_jdbc_platform
property.description: Database platform used by Metron. One of: hsqldb, h2, oracle, mysql, postgresql

property.name: metron_jdbc_client_path
property.description: Path to JDBC jar for selected platform

property.name: metron_temp_grok_path
property.description: Temporary HDFS file path where grok patterns are written during testing

property.name: metron_spring_options
property.description: Additional Spring options not included in the rest_application.yml file

property.name: metron_escalation_topic
property.description: Escalated alerts will be produced to this topic

property.name: metron_rest_classpath
property.description: Additional classpath for metron REST.

property.name: metron_indexing_classpath
property.description: Classpath for metron indexing if Elasticsearch isn't being used

property.name: metron_sysconfig
property.description: Local location of a custom sysconfig

property.name: metron_rest_pid_dir
property.description: Metron REST PID Dir.

property.name: user_settings_hbase_table
property.description: The HBase table which will hold user settings

property.name: user_settings_hbase_cf
property.description: The HBase column family which will hold user settings in HBase.

property.name: source_type_field
property.description: The field name where the source type can be found in the search indices. This setting primarily affects the Alerts UI.

property.name: threat_triage_score_field
property.description: The field name where the threat triage score can be found in the search indices. This setting primarily affects the Alerts UI.
